description: Try our easy to follow Margarita recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Margarita Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place salt on a plate. Rub rim of one side of a chilled serving glass with a lime or lemon wedge. Dip rim of glass in salt to coat. Wipe away any salt from inside glass.

Place tequila, orange liqueur, lime and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker. Add plenty of ice and shake well. Place fresh ice in serving glass. Strain margarita into glass. Garnish with a lime slice. Serve.
